name: Halloween Memory
description:
Halloween Memory is a game with beautiful graphics and terrifying music. Puzzle, in the style of "Halloween", you will like it.
The game develops memory well, the goal of the game is to find paired cards in the allotted time. Passing levels you will receive points.
Compete with your friends, who will score more?

The game contains:
- Pleasant music
- Scary sounds
- Atmosphere "Halloween"
- Beautiful images and pleasant atmosphere

Enjoy your game and good luck!
